skill.name: deeptools
skill.description: NGS analysis toolkit. BAM to bigWig conversion, QC (correlation, PCA, fingerprints), heatmaps/profiles (TSS, peaks), for ChIP-seq, RNA-seq, ATAC-seq visualization.
skill.summary: NGS analysis toolkit. BAM to bigWig conversion, QC (correlation, PCA, fingerprints), heatmaps/profil...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill includes local scripts that read and write user-specified files to validate inputs and generate workflow templates. No network calls or command execution paths are present.

content.user_title: Generate deepTools workflows for NGS analysis
content.value_statement: I need reliable deepTools workflows and normalization guidance for NGS data. This skill validates files and generates ready-to-edit scripts with clear references.
actual_capabilities: Validate BAM, bigWig, and BED file existence and readability
Check BAM index files and report missing indexes
Generate ChIP-seq QC workflow bash templates
Generate ChIP-seq analysis templates with heatmap and profile steps
Generate RNA-seq coverage and ATAC-seq workflow templates
limitations: Does not run deepTools or execute external commands
Does not download data or call external APIs
Validation is basic and does not parse BAM contents
Generated scripts require manual edits and execution

use_cases.title: Quick ChIP-seq QC
use_cases.description: Create a QC workflow template to check correlation, PCA, coverage, and fingerprints before deeper analysis.

use_cases.title: Standardized pipelines
use_cases.description: Generate consistent deepTools scripts for comparisons and visualization across multiple projects.

use_cases.title: ATAC-seq setup
use_cases.description: Produce an ATAC-seq workflow with Tn5 correction, coverage tracks, and peak heatmaps.

prompt_templates.title: Validate inputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate these files for deepTools: BAMs sample1.bam sample2.bam and BED peaks.bed. Report missing indexes and format errors.

prompt_templates.title: ChIP-seq QC script
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a chipseq_qc workflow script using Input.bam and ChIP1.bam ChIP2.bam with genome size 2913022398.

prompt_templates.title: RNA-seq coverage
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an rnaseq_coverage workflow for rnaseq.bam with 8 threads and output directory rnaseq_cov.

prompt_templates.title: ATAC-seq with peaks
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate an atacseq workflow using atac.bam, peaks.bed, genome size 2913022398, and output dir atac_analysis.

output_examples.input: Generate a ChIP-seq QC workflow for Input.bam and ChIP1.bam ChIP2.bam.
output: Creates a bash script with correlation, PCA, coverage, fragment size, and fingerprint steps
Sets editable variables for genome size, threads, and output directory
Explains where results will be written

best_practices: Edit file paths and genome size values before running generated scripts
Run file validation before heavy deepTools processing
Use consistent normalization across samples in the same comparison
anti_patterns: Running workflow scripts without updating placeholder file names
Using RNA-seq with read extension in bamCoverage
Mixing genome assemblies across BAM and BED files

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill uses plain text instructions and templates that work in Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the limits of the file validation?
faq.answer: Validation checks existence, readability, BAM indexes, and basic BED formatting. It does not inspect BAM contents.

faq.question: How do I integrate the workflows with my pipeline?
faq.answer: Generate a script, edit paths and parameters, then call it from your pipeline as a standard bash step.

faq.question: Does this skill access or transmit my data?
faq.answer: No. There are no network calls, and files are read only for local validation.

faq.question: What if a workflow script fails to run?
faq.answer: Check file paths, missing dependencies, and input formats. Then rerun on a small region for testing.

faq.question: How does this compare to the deepTools documentation?
faq.answer: It packages common workflows and references into ready templates for faster setup and fewer errors.
